_sText:
Gossamer - Bomb/Defuse
Made by Foofinoo


What if Simon had written his special gaming memories instead of the book we know?

What if reading his words could give us an insight into his best matches instead of horrifying us and trapping us in his fears and anxieties?

Then maybe we'd have had the perfect playground for some thrilling games, rather than this monster-infested city.

We wanted to see how it could have ended differently if we changed the source of all this insanity: the book.

Our mission is to win this match.


Oh well, it only took a whole year, after all!
As with my two previous maps, if you're interested in the process of how I made and developed this map over the course of the last year, I warmly invite you to check out the dedicated WiP page over there.

Now about the map itself, I hope it's not too hard to see that it is largely inspired by Cry Of Fear, a pretty incredible Half-Life horror mod released over eleven years ago by the Team Psykskallar!
Being totally free, there's no excuse if you've never played it before.

The main idea behind this map was simply to pay tribute to that game.
As I wrote on the WiP page, I've always wanted to make a map for Cry Of Fear, but working with GoldSource on a single map when the campaign is already so perfect didn't seem very interesting...
So I came up with the idea of making a sort of medley of several of the game's key locations to obtain a map that would be playable and, I hope, enjoyable and fun.

That being said, I couldn't limit myself to the default CS:S assets.
I like the idea of having a map that's completely unique from the others.
So once again, I used the splendid assets of the stunning game that is INFRA.
Just to remind you, INFRA is an incredible walking simulator / puzzle game by Loiste Interactive made with the Source Engine that I can only recommend.

In addition to this, I also used a few assets from a great horror mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two named Grey and made by the DeppreSick Team.
It's also free, so don't hesitate to check it out too!

With all these assets, I think I was able to make the biggest and most varied map I've ever made to date.
There are details all over the place, and plenty of references to Cry Of Fear.
So don't hesitate to wander around - you never know what you might stumble across!

And finally, here are some interesting figures about the map:
  • About 5530 brushes and 32720 faces!
  • Approximately 550 unique textures, including 350 custom ones!
  • Around 440 unique models, including 370 custom ones!
  • A total of about 500 MB of custom content!

Well, I think that says it all.
Once again, feel free to take a look at the WiP page for more information about the map.
Now, all that's left for me to say is have fun and enjoy!


Foofinoo
July 3, 2023
